Text: Bingham Teamas we discussed heres the brief description Bart had circulated within Enron regarding our participation on this project Nick Politan will be in overall charge of the project and will be the principal in charge of outside legal review of development matters including the EPC and equipment procurement contracts assisted by Rick Filosa Both Nick and Rick are located in Binghams New York office Bruce Silvers will handle Connecticut regulatory matters and Mark Oland will handle Connecticut real estate and permitting Bruce and Mark are located in Binghams Hartford office We all look forward to working with you and please dont hesitate to call any of us at any time See attached file Development Agreement bRdoc See attached file CRRA LOI bRdoc
